meanings.definition: A fine powder made from dried cannabis plants.
meanings.sent1: I sprinkled some keef on top of my brownie.
meanings.sent2: The keef added a flavorful kick to the dish.
meanings.sent3: The chef accidentally spilled keef all over the kitchen!
meanings.sent4: The sun glistened on the keef, making it sparkle like diamonds.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the keef filled the room, enticing everyone.

meanings.definition: To grind cannabis plants into a fine powder.
meanings.sent1: I need to keef the cannabis before baking.
meanings.sent2: She carefully keefed the plants to get the perfect texture.
meanings.sent3: He keefed so fast that he created a cloud of dust!
meanings.sent4: The old grinder keefed the plants with a rhythmic hum.
meanings.sent5: The sound of keefing echoed through the kitchen, signaling the start of the process.
